channel.title: Creating Private Servers?
channel.description:
Basically within the past day I have had an intrest to create my own runescape server, Its getting very stressfull finding the correct sources and client -.-
Anyway I have both a source and a client, I start the server up and on moparscape I can use it for about 3 secounds and then it logs me out. It does say something about a port being unable to be used but i dont think this is the general problem as it instantly logs me out.
I didnt have much look using no ip either -.-
And the server clearly isnt connected to the client in anyway, I could really do with some help, so please either get in touch with me through these forums and give me instant help on msn messnger?
Many Thanks. :mad:

item.title: Creating Private Servers?
item.dc:creator: @FaZeScape FaZeScape
item.description:
@FaZeScape wrote:

I could help you out a bit, show you the basics and such if you would like. if you do just contact me on msn.
fmcomar@hotmail.com

Read full topic

item.title: Creating Private Servers?
item.dc:creator: @Cool_Kiid Cool Kiid
item.description:
@Cool_Kiid wrote:

Use no-ip then keep in mind you have to connect to 127.0.0.1 but others connect to your no-ip.

Read full topic

item.title: Creating Private Servers?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

This is the Server Tutorial section.

Post your problem in the Server Help section instead.

Basically within the past day I have had an intrest to create my own runescape server, Its getting very stressfull finding the correct sources and client -.-

I start the server up and on moparscape I can use it for about 3 secounds and then it logs me out. It does say something about a port being unable to be used but i dont think this is the general problem as it instantly logs me out.
